resources.string:
Banking can now be local to digitally engaged customers worldwide. Customers are all embracing brands that provide the ability to open and use accounts 24/7/365 without visiting a local branch.

 One such approach is to involve local neighborhood stores to provide banking services digitally. 

 Agent Banking help customers to deposit or withdraw money or inquire about their account balance.
 
 Customers shall feel the convenience of banking in retail outlet contracted by a financial institution to process the transactions.
